Subject: NEA console appears to be hanging at 'Testing SQL Connection'
Description:
Customer has observed the console in their 'Health' environment appears to be hanging when at 'Testing SQL Connection' when launching the console. After rebooting the NEA server the console launches without issue, however this kills and currently running jobs.

This may be some network latency or other influence. Will need to correlate if current running jobs may correlate with the issue, any issues accessing SQL server during time issue is occurring such as through SSMS, or SQL server logs.

Please Cc john.hilsher@netwrix.com and denney.james@netwrix.com on communications and for any meeting invites with the customer.
Solution_Comment__c:
[Issue]
Console was hanging while attempting to open --this was confirmed by Event ID 1002 in the Windows Application event log

[Resolution]
Patching to NEA v11.6.0.111 seems to have corrected the issue
